hymn.title: E-X-A-C-T
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - F/C C | C/E G C - | C - Dm - | G7 - C - | Am - Dm/F - | G7 - C - |

layout.singingstanza: Ex -- act is what we all will be In word, and deed, and time. E- -- X- -- A- -- C- -- T, E- -- X- -- A- -- C- -- T, E- -- X- -- A- -- C- -- T. We'll al -- ways be ex -- act.

lyrics.stanza: Exact is what we all will be In word, and deed, and time. E-X-A-C-T, E-X-A-C-T, E-X-A-C-T. We'll always be exact.
Our every word will be exact You can depend on it. E-X-A-C-T, E-X-A-C-T, E-X-A-C-T. Each word is accurate.
Our every deed will be exact. You can depend on it. E-X-A-C-T, E-X-A-C-T, E-X-A-C-T. Each deed—we'll do our best.
